item.title: 2016 Harvest of Potatoes and Onions or Incredible Peasant Onions Harvested
item.description: Dateline: 20 August 2016 AD This was my first experience harvesting potato onions. Earlier this year, on April 23rd, I wrote a post about my discovery of potato onions and my interest in growing this variety. I was intrigued by the concept of a self-perpetuating onion, similar to garlic. Growing onions every year without purchasing sets or seeds seemed incredibly appealing. To start, I bought a pound of potato onion sets from the Maine Potato Lady and planted them in a garden bed that spring.
